verses.roman:
pūrve yena pṛthivīra bhāra haribāre
kṛṣṇa avatīrṇa hailā śāstrete pracāre

synonyms: pūrve—previously; yena—as; pṛthivīra—of the earth; bhāra—burden; haribāre—to take away; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; avatīrṇa—incarnated; hailā—was; śāstrete—the scriptures; pracāre—proclaim.
translation: The scriptures proclaim that Lord Kṛṣṇa previously descended to take away the burden of the earth.
